mapper.select: SELECT * FROM daifa_after_sale_sub WHERE after_type = 1 AND after_status IN ( 2, 3 ) AND apply_deal_status = 1 AND refund_id NOT IN ( SELECT refund_id FROM daifa_after_receive_expres_stock WHERE refund_id IN ( SELECT refund_id FROM daifa_after_sale_sub WHERE after_type = 1 AND after_status IN ( 2, 3 ) AND apply_deal_status = 1 ) ) AND apply_time <= ${date}
SELECT t1.df_order_id FROM daifa_after_sale_sub t1,daifa_after_money_consult t2 WHERE t1.refund_id = t2.refund_id AND t1.after_status = 7 AND t2.create_time <= ${date}
